doc.title: Bondage Stories 2
doc.plot: In the first bondage story line, government agent Giselle Fox is ordered to serve as a bodyguard for a scientist's beautiful daughter, but the blonde bombshell will have done of it. Giselle tries to force Amber to stay home by tying her to a chair, but soon the tables are turned. When kidnappers grab both ladies, Amber wishes she had listened to Giselle's advice. In the second story, a model is mistaken for a U.S. agent and captured by a foreign spy. Another agent snatches both ladies and leaves them to struggle in bondage while he decides who is telling the truth.
